channel.title: I freeze and i dont know why!

item.title: I freeze and i dont know why!
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

[quote=“QQmuchnerd, post:1, topic:462496”]Whenever i click the ““bank all”” button or some other certain things on the server my client freezes for about 10 seconds then resumes normally after, without logging me off. Please Help!!

Update: when i click on the bank all button, in my cmd it says actionbutton: 89223
I looked it up and in my files it says
}
switch (actionButtonId){
//crafting + fletching interface:
case 89223: //Deposit Inventory
for(int itemID = 0; itemID < 101; itemID++) {
for(int invSlot = 0; invSlot < 28; invSlot++) {
c.getItems().bankItem(itemID, invSlot, 2147000000);
}[/quote]

There’s another bracket at the end right?

			case 89223:
				for(int itemID = 0; itemID < 101; itemID++) {
					for(int invSlot = 0; invSlot < 28; invSlot++) {
						c.getItems().bankItem(itemID, invSlot, 2147000000);
					}
				}
				break;
